name: Creative Writing
descriptions: The Creative Writing minor develops skills in fiction, poetry, and other creative forms through workshop-based courses. Students take 18 hours in Writing, English, or Creative Writing with 12 hours at the upper-division level.
Students who major in English or Writing may count no more than 6 hours of creative writing toward their major.

courses: 18 hours in Writing, English, or Creative Writing (excluding ENGL 10803 and ENGL 20803), with 12 hours in upper-division courses
